# CiWorkflowCreateRequest.Data

**Object**

The data element of the request you use to create a new Xcode Cloud workflow.

## Declaration

```swift
object CiWorkflowCreateRequest.Data
```

## Objects

- **CiWorkflowCreateRequest.Data.Attributes**: The attributes you set that describe the new Xcode Cloud workflow resource.
- **CiWorkflowCreateRequest.Data.Relationships**: The relationships to other resources that you can set with this request.
